reviews.text: Beautiful quaint resort by a nice stream. Very arty. The pool is really pretty. It has really nice lounging spots by the spring.
reviews.title: Lovely Location and Pretty Resort but Slack Services and Maintenance.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check-in didn't go too smoothly. Originally I booked 2 rooms then later I cancelled 1 while requesting for an extra bed for the remaining 1 room. Upon arrival they were expecting us to take 2 rooms. Despite me showing them my cancellation letter from Booking.com they still tried to sell us 2 rooms, insisting that the Superior Double Room would be too small to add an extra bed. They also tried selling us the Villa Story (largest 2 storey room sleeping 4). We declined since we were only there for 1 night and it was fine to add the extra bed despite the room being a bit cramp. The Villa Story was more than double our Superior Double Room rate.
reviews.title: There's no excuse
